name: comparekart-price-finder
description: AI-powered price comparison across major Indian e-commerce platforms. Find the best deals on products from Amazon, JioMart, Zepto, Instamart, Purplle, Tira, Mamaearth, and more with category-based filtering.
author: CompareKart Team

tools.name: compare_product_prices
tools.description: Compare prices of a product across multiple Indian e-commerce platforms with category-based filtering. Returns best deals, savings, and direct purchase links.

product_name.description: Name of the product to search for (e.g., 'iPhone 15', 'Lakme lipstick', 'Maggi noodles')

platforms.description: Comma-separated list of specific platforms to search (optional)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results per platform (default: 5)

tools.name: get_available_platforms
tools.description: Get list of all available e-commerce platforms organized by category

tools.name: get_platform_categories
tools.description: Get available product categories and their associated platforms for targeted searching

tools.name: validate
tools.description: Validate server ownership - returns server owner's phone number as required by Puch AI MCP compliance

tools.name: find_best_deal
tools.description: Find the absolute best deal for a specific product across all platforms

product_name.description: Name of the product to find best deal for
